function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of residual insecticides","Impact":"Negative impact on environment and human health","Mitigation":"Adopt alternative non-toxic methods for insect control","Technologies":"Biological control, insect repellents","People":"General population, agricultural workers","Owner":"Environmental agencies, research institutions"},{"Description":"Pitching camps near refuse, debris, and loose rocks","Impact":"Increased risk of sand fly transmission of diseases","Mitigation":"Selecting camp locations away from potential sand fly breeding sites","Technologies":"Geospatial mapping, environmental monitoring","People":"Military personnel, travelers","Owner":"Military, travel agencies"},{"Description":"Spraying chemicals around tents and buildings","Impact":"Negative impact on environment and human health","Mitigation":"Using environmentally friendly alternatives for insect control","Technologies":"Natural insecticides, eco-friendly repellents","People":"Residents, military personnel","Owner":"Environmental agencies, military"}]}
